nodes.text: Evlyn Tabory was the daughter of Rosemari Pressor Tabory, the niece of Jorad Pressor, and the granddaughter of Dillian Pressor.

Evlyn was born on the Redoubt around 12 ABY and helped her uncle in his duties as Guardian of the People, using her Force powers to manipulate intruders into falling into traps set around the Dreadnaughts. Evlyn was Force-sensitive, a fact that Rosemary and Jorad covered up to prevent her from being exiled to D-Three. She did not go when Luke Skywalker asked her if she wanted to go with him to the Jedi Praxeum even though she did want to.
